side-title: What can we help you with?
footer-desc: Kickstart your 21-day free trial now. No credit card required. Switch to Free plan after trial.
footer-newsletter-desc: The latest Sketch news, articles, and resources, sent straight to your inbox every month.
home-banner-title: Free yourself and be more productive
home-banner-desc: Empowering people and businesses to do their best at work and life with the help of technology
home-section-1-title:
Simple Human Resource system : Database, Payroll, Lending.
We have it all!
home-section-1-desc: The services that help your company start from Managing your employee information, Attendance, Payroll disbursement, and Employee lending.
home-whyus-desc: The world of HR is complex – that’s why we built a flexible platform for the entire HR ecosystem.
home-whyus-item-4: Compensation (payroll) management with minimal human intervention
home-whyus-item-6: Vast expandable network of partners/financial services
home-services-desc: The services that help your company start from Managing your employee information, Attendance, Payroll disbursement, and Employee lending.
home-services-item-1-desc: With Modana human resources (HR) services, obtaining information becomes a speedy process as all you need to do is type in what you’re searching for. You only need to enter the data once, such as a salary slip, new payroll policy. Any changes made are automatically updated wherever it is assigned without having to manually change it everywhere.
home-services-item-2-desc: Forget the hassle cash-based payroll payment and leave it to Modana to handle it. Distributing cashless payroll to each of your employee. Easy and secure.
home-services-item-3-desc: Since we are providing method of payback through automate debit from payroll, we could minimize the NPL. So do not worry much about delinquency. Work Hard, Gets More!
help-center-banner-title: What can we help you with?
about-us-banner-title: Creating a world where work empowers a better life
about-us-content-body: We are now in the Industrial Revolution 4.0, an era of ubiquitous connectivity of people, machines and real time data. Modana is here to help people to be ready for this. Through the platform, we would help people improving their financial literacy towards economic inclusion for everyone. Because in Modana, everyone matters.
about-us-vision-desc: Sustainable and responsible economic inclusion for everyone.
about-us-mission-desc: Empowering people and businesses to do their best at work and life with the help of technology
about-us-meet-team-desc: The world of HR is complex – that’s why we built a flexible platform for the entire HR ecosystem.
about-us-join-us-title: Our team is growing. Come join us on the journey.
about-us-join-us-desc: When you work on something you care about, with people you enjoy spending time with, it’s an amazing feeling. That energy. That oomph. That’s Modana. We believe everyone has the potential to feel this way at work.
about-us-body: Designed for businesses, employers and employees to work seamlessly. Automating day to day transactions to make possible greater efficiencies, lowering cost of management and helping the economy through inclusion.
about-us-value-list-1-desc: Making Indonesia 4.0, cashable society, getting SME online
about-us-value-list-2-desc: New Channel, underwriting, collection credit scoring
about-us-value-list-3-desc: Simple affordable HR, know your employee, cashless, payroll, productivity
about-us-value-list-4-desc: Fair financial access, financial literacy, access to broader network
overview-whyus-desc: The world of HR is complex – that’s why we built a flexible platform for the entire HR ecosystem.
overview-banner-title: It’s time to tame the chaos of payroll, benefits, and HR
overview-banner-desc: Empowering people and businesses to do their best at work and life with the help of technology
overview-whyus-1-desc: With Modana human resources (HR) services, obtaining information becomes a speedy process as all you need to do is type in what you’re searching for.
overview-whyus-2-desc: Forget the hassle cash-based payroll payment and leave it to Modana to handle it. Distributing cashless payroll to each of your employee. Easy and secure.
overview-whyus-3-desc: Sketch is a design toolkit built to help you create your best work— from your earliest ideas, through to final artwork
overview-trust-desc: Every company has different needs. With Zenefits, you’ll have access to scores of apps, industry tools, and providers that cater to your company’s culture — not the other way around.
hr-banner-title: Managing your employee faster and easier
hr-banner-desc: With Modana human resources (HR) services, obtaining information becomes a speedy process as all you need to do is type in what you’re searching for.
hr-fitur-detail-1-desc: With Modana human resources (HR) services, obtaining information becomes a speedy process as all you need to do is type in what you’re searching for. You only need to enter the data once, such as a salary slip, new payroll policy. Any changes made are automatically updated wherever it is assigned without having to manually change it everywhere.
hr-fitur-detail-2-desc: Tracking employee requests such as overtime, leaves and view past requests along with their status will be very easy to do. Employers can easily approve or reject requests based on queries requested by users.
hr-fitur-detail-3-desc: Modana HRIS can also store information and company documents which can only be accessed by authorized personnel. This means that HRIS are completely secure and confidential information can be stored without worries, and without big space
payroll-banner-desc: Forget the hassle cash-based payroll payment and leave it to Modana to handle it. Distributing cashless payroll to each of your employee. Easy and secure.
payroll-fitur-detail-1: Forget the hassle cash-based payroll payment and leave it to Modana to handle it. Distributing cashless payroll to each of your employee. Easy and secure.
payroll-fitur-detail-2: Efficiencies can be a core factor to a successful business. Thus Modana Payroll system will handle the automation on your payroll system with minimum human intervention, maximum productivity!
lending-banner-title: Simple loan for your employees needs
lending-section-1-desc: We are using technology to simplify every step of the loan process to make a better experience for you and your employee
lending-list-1-desc: Since we are providing method of payback through automate debit from payroll, we could minimize the NPL. So do not worry much about delinquency. Work Hard, Gets More!
lending-list-2-desc: You can apply for a loan whenever you need, wherever you are.
lending-list-3-desc: Underwriting process will be “lighting speed”, with reliable data through Modana HR system
hc-account-1-desc: Please contact Modana Customer Service at 021-22580602 or email to info@modana.id
hc-account-2-desc: Press “Forgot Password” and we will send the new password to your personal email / phone number that has been registered in our system
hc-account-3-desc: Press re-send OTP and check the internet connection from your internet provider
hc-account-4-desc: Please check the internet connection from your internet provider
hc-account-5-desc: Please check with your company HR and the internet connection from your internet provider
hc-account-6-desc: Please check with your company HR and the internet connection from your internet provider
hc-payroll-1-desc: Please check with your company HR and the internet connection from your internet provider
hc-payroll-2-desc: Please try to re-log in to Modana Application / Web application, and if it still not update, please contact Modana Customer Service by Email to info@modana.id
hc-attendance-1-desc: Please contact Modana Customer Service by email to info@modana.id
hc-attendance-2: I’m too late/ too early to clock on/clock off
hc-attendance-2-desc: Please contact your company HR to verifu with your working attendance
hc-attendance-3-desc: Requesting overtime can be done through the attendance page [Symbol] Request Overtime
hc-lending-1-desc: Please click the Loan menu, and follow the intructions. Your score will be based on your performance
hc-lending-2-desc: Please read the Terms and Conditions for borrowers, if you already fulfill the requirement, you will be eligible to request a Loan
hc-lending-3: My Loan request has been rejected
hc-lending-3-desc: Please check your fulfillment on the required information on requesting a Loan, for more details you can read the terms and conditions for borrowers
hc-lending-4-desc: Payment will be automatically deducted from your salary, or you can manually pay through Modanaku. For more details, please read the terms and conditions for borrower
hc-lending-5-desc: Please make sure your balance in sufficient, if the balance is already sufficient, please contact Modana Customer Service by Email to info@modana.id; if the balance is unsufficient, you can do a top up
hc-virtual-account-1-desc: Top up can be done through transfer from your personal Bank Account, please make sure details of Virtual Account number when you requested to top up
hc-virtual-account-2-desc: Please contact Modana Customer Service at 021-22580602 or email to info@modana.id
hc-virtual-account-3-desc: Please check your sufficient balance or contact Modana Customer Service at 021-22580602 or email to info@modana.id
hc-virtual-account-4-desc: Please contact Modana Customer Service at 021-22580602 or email to info@modana.id
hc-virtual-account-6-desc: Please check your internet connection, or you can contact Modana Customer Service at 021-22580602 or email to info@modana.id
hc-virtual-account-7: Modanaku being used by unknown users
hc-virutal-account-7-desc: Please contact Modana Customer Service at 021-22580602 or email to info@modana.id
